simplifiedChinese.title: Foundation and Fruit of the Gospel
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What God-given commands can you discover in this story?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Put yourself in the story and imagine what it originally might have been like to receive this command. How does this relate to you in your personal life today?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What God-inspired promises can you discover in this story? How can you walk in more of this in your own life?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Draw a picture about what these promises mean for you.
